Header: Suspect wanted over the murder of a Police Officer killed in a shootout
Content: A suspect wanted over the murder of a Police Officer in Akuressa on the 22 nd of last month, was killed in a shoot out with the Police this dawn. 30 year old Police Constable Kasun Sampath was killed during a raid on illicit liquor manufactures in the Urumuththa area. During a search carried out this morning, the 56 year old suspect had opened fire at the Police and was killed when Police returned fire.
